summary: Patch for Scoped Bows and Requiem 1.8
descriptionHtml:
[u]Requiem Scoped Bows Patch[/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58141/?]Updated Patch here[/url]

This patch works but the updated version is above :)Â 

Ensures the damage values for scoped bows are in line with Requiem equivalents. It also adds appropriate conditions for crafting.

If there are any issues please let me know!

Credits to Ogerboss for Requiem and to OutLaw666 for his brilliant Scoped Bows.

This is for Requiem 1.8.1 and Scoped Bows 1.4 Legendary

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url]
